attributes.action: Make it LAW that bicycle helmets should be compulsary for all riders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe this would prevent many serious injuries.
Most children see wearing a helmet as uncool.
However, if it was LAW and everyone had to wear one, then they would have to also.
This would take any embarrassment away from wearing one.
Wearing a helmet, is equally as important, as wearing a seat belt in a motor vehicle.
It saves lives.
